dangerZone.title: Critical Actions
dangerZone.warningText: The following actions cannot be undone or can only be partially reversed. Make sure you know what you are doing.
dangerZone.regenerateScheduleDesc: Regenerates the schedule. All breaks will be redistributed.
dangerZone.resetScheduleDesc: Resets the schedule. All results are preserved.
dangerZone.endTournamentDesc: Ends all matches after this point. Incomplete matches will be cancelled.
dangerZone.archiveTournamentDesc: Hides the tournament from the home page. Does NOT delete anything.
dangerZone.deleteTournamentDesc: Irreversible! All data will be deleted.

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.emptyLogHint: The activity log will be filled once changes are made to the tournament.

exports.title: Exports
exports.eventsDescription: Exports events (goals, cards, penalties) as CSV or JSON file.
exports.auditDescription: Exports the complete change log (results, corrections, status changes) as CSV file.
exports.statisticsDescription: Exports statistics like top scorers and fair play table as PDF.
exports.summaryDescription: Generates a complete tournament report with all results, tables and statistics as PDF.
exports.noMatchesFound: No matches found for selected teams.
exports.backupDescription: Creates a complete backup as JSON file. Includes: Tournament, teams, schedule, results, sponsors.
exports.restoreWarning: Overwrites all current data for this tournament! A new backup will be created automatically.
